price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߠߋ߬ ߞߏ߫ ߣߌ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߝߏߦߌ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߛߎߓߊ߯ߦߊ ߜߍߘߐߕߊ
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waqālū in hādhā illā siḥ'run mubīnun
